body.name: Nictemaw Portable Washing Machine 30Lbs Capacity Washer and Dryer Combo 2 In 1 Compact Twin Tub Laundry Washer (19Lbs) & Spinner (11Lbs) with Built-in Drain Pump, Time Control, for Apartment Dorms RV
body.stockDetail: Only 20 left in stock - order soon.
features: 💦30Lbs Large Capacity--The portable washing machine has twin tub design for operating the washer or spinner separately, and you can also run two sides at the same time. Upgrade enlarged capacity, helps you solve laundry problems at once. Washing capacity: 19 lbs, spinner dryer capacity: 11 lbs, perfect for washing daily laundry quickly.

💦Easy to Operate--Designed with the 3 knobs including washing selector, washing timer and spin timer. Simple operation steps save your time. Three modes: Soft/Standard/Drain, even the elderly can use the washer and dryer combo conveniently. Equipped with a powerful built-in drainage pump, can quickly discharge the water from the tub.

💦360W Wash Power &180W Spin Power--This semi-automatic washing machine is equipped with dual motor system presents strong laundry power, providing 2000 rpm stable power. The high-speed water spinning can clean the dirt effectively. Our washer machine can achieve low consumption and save water, saving as much as 84% energy consumption compared to similar models.

💦Separate Time Control--Washer and spin dryer function has separate timer control, which makes laundry washing more convenient and efficient. The washer control timer runs for 15 minutes while the spin cycle timer runs for 5 minutes per load. You could choose the suitable time when washing based on different requirements.

💦Compact and Portable--The space-saving and lightweight design of the portable washing machine is ideal for small places such as camping, apartments and dorms. The size of 22.6" x 14.2" x 25.8" is suitable for limited space and easily moved. No installation is required. NOTE: Please contact us if you have any questions, we will respond within 24h and resolve the problems for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nictemaw 2 IN 1 Compact Twin Tub Washing Machine--The perfect solution for doing laundry 19Lbs Washing Capacity + 11Lbs Spinning Capacity with Built-in Drain Pump / Separate Timer Control The portable washing machine features 2 independent tubs, one washing tub with 19 lbs capacity and the other a spinning tub with 11 lbs capacity. The washing cycle is up to 15 minutes, and the spinning cycle is up to 5 minutes per load, saving you valuable time. No installation is required, and all accessories are included, making it easy to assemble and use right away.Coming with double strong motors, the washing power can reach 360 W and the spinning power can reach 180 W. In this way, clothes can be washed efficiently. The built-in drain pump and extended drain hose effortlessly drain water from the washer and more convenient.Easy to move and transport anywhere, its lightweight and space-saving design allows it to easily fit in a bathroom, manufactured from a durable ABS body, ideal for dorms, apartments, homes, RV’s, camping trips or anywhere with limited space. Features: Two separate tubs: 19 lbs washing tub and 11lbs spinning tubCompact and lightweight designSimple control panel2000 rpm powerful motorEquipped with a drain pump and an extended water hoseAdjustable washing/spinning time and separate time controlHigh-quality PP ABS bodyNot easy to deform and rustSave electricity and water

Two Holes for Water Inlet It has 2 inlet holes on right & left side. You can freely install the hose based on your faucet location Drain Hose Hung Up Drain hose can be hung up to the side after use Transparent Top Cover Check laundry status at any time. Top Lid for Safe Spin Dry Spinner can make 80%-90% drying, you may still need to air-dry the clothesComes with a cover plate, when using the spin tube, put it above the clothes to protect them from being thrown away at high speed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful washer and spin dryer! I absolutely love this machine, it is so easy to use,the clothes are almost dry when the spin cycle is done,it fits perfect in my apartment, it is worth the purchase!But just know that the washer agitates very strongly so your clothes gets vey clean,and drains very well. ENJOY!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: It works and easy to operate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing washing machine
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It works very well, it's also very easy and convenience to use, the instruction is very clear and very easy to instruct. Gets all my laundry clean, and the spin dryer works amazing as well, the laundry come out of the spin dryer are almost dry so you can just hang them and all of them gets dry within just one day. Also, the washing machine is bigger than i expected, the capacity can handle a weekly load of my household laundry, definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight Portable Washing Machine
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This portable washing machine is just perfect for what I need. It weights only 20.9 lbs which makes it so easy to move around the small area where I live right now. When I first tried the wash program option I was so surprise how clean my clothing was after just 15 minutes. This is so convenient when going outdoors or camping; it just need to be connected to an outlet and it does the cleaning job for you! I recommend this portable washing machine to people that enjoy going on a road trip camping because it’s a lightweight appliance that can be carried in a RV or a truck, it can even fit inside a SUV!!! The twin tub is a plus because you can do both: washing and spinning at the same time, and in just one portable device..
